What We Do

CREATE runs and provides:
  • - Workshops for beginners on electronics, programming, soldering, prototyping and 3D modelling.
  • - Weekly sales of electronic components on-campus, including Kits
  • - Hackerspaces and makerspaces
  • - Quadcopters
  • - CREATE Starters: Funding and support for student projects.

    • Join us and we'll send you week-by-week information of what events are ahead during the semester.
    Join our Mailing List

    Upcoming CREATE events are summarised in a weekly email. Join the mailing list to find out what's going on and how to get involved.

    CREATE

    Never miss out on our amazing workshops, projects and job opportunities.

    Our Sponsors

    Register on OrgSync

    If you are a UNSW student then please sign up to CREATE on OrgSync too. This process helps CREATE get funding from Arc.
    Come to our events

    Come along to the events you are interested in. Meet up with other CREATE members and executives. All events are announced on our mailing list and our facebook page.
    Come to our Meetings

    If you are keen to get involved with the running of the club: come along to our meetings. Here you can take part in the club's future. Meetings are announced in the mailing list and our facebook page.
